text:
*Craze is hiring a Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Craze is searching for a dynamic marketing manager who can be our agency MVP! Applicants should come with experience in managing social, paid-ads, and content for brands or in the agency scene. Outstanding communication and organization skills are a requirement.

This role is remote; however Craze team members will have the option of working a few days each week from hubs in NYC, LA, or Miami.

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/3tbcCqw>

<@U01MELRVD1S>
